dct_title_s: The ancient Silk Road : Afghanistan in context ; an illustrated map featuring the ancient network of routes between China and Europe / production by Twin Age Ltd ; edited by Bijan Omrani, David Chappell & Jeremy Tredinnick ; designed by Au Yeung Chui Kwai ; maps by Mark Stroud, Moon Street Cartography ; main photography, Antonia Tozer. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. "One large overview map and three detailed regional maps." Cover title. "All maps © copyright 2011, 2007 Airphoto International Ltd." for Odyssey Maps Includes 33 colored photographs, 55 indexed sites of interest with notes about each. Includes text and color illustrations. "Odyssey Maps Odyssey Guides"--On cover. "For this Second Edition we have also shown a number of trade routes dating to more recent centuries that are worthy of note for their role in continuing the transfer of goods, ideas and culture between East and West."
